column4: Is there any good program for Ubuntu that I can create animated gifs with?
yes.. what is the source?
Still pictures, like jpegs or png.
lots of lots of them or a few?
Let's say five or six
ah... ok
I'm mostly just asking out of curiousity, I don't have a specific project I'm looking to tackle
you can try http://www.gimp.org/tutorials/Simple_Animations/
actually there are lots of ways
Oh cool, I didn't know that GIMP could create gifs
mplayer will even do it from the command line
that's normally when you have hundreds or thousands of them
Huh, I'll have to read the tutorial and look into mplayer more.
Thanks so much for the help!
or you can just upload them to http://www.gickr.com/upload_files
my pleasure :)
just to cap off your irc experience.. can you guess how I found those answers ? :)
I suppose Google would be the obvious answer?
try this http://tinyurl.com/caj9k4
:P
I've Googled it before, but to little success.  Thanks for your help, though
my pleasure
